headline.main: Democrats Move to Beef Up Fund-Raising With Staff Overhaul

docs.snippet: The Democratic National Committee is moving to drastically beef up its fund-raising arm, adding a co-chairman and six others to leadership positions to help raise money for the 2016 presidential race....
docs.abstract: The Democratic National Committee is moving to drastically beef up its fund-raising arm, adding a co-chairman and six others to leadership positions to help raise money for the 2016 presidential race.

headline.main: Computer Models Failing to Accurately Predict Path of Flames
headline.print_headline: Computer Models Failing to Accurately Predict Path of Flames

docs.snippet: Wildfires that have raged in California this summer haven't just overwhelmed firefighters — they've also stumped computer models designed to predict the intensity of flames and where they'll burn....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wildfires that have raged in California this summer haven't just overwhelmed firefighters — they've also stumped computer models designed to predict the intensity of flames and where they'll burn.

headline.main: Mauna Kea Telescope Protesters Say Stone Altar Was Destroyed
headline.print_headline: Mauna Kea Telescope Protesters Say Stone Altar Was Destroyed

docs.snippet: People protesting the construction of a giant telescope on a Hawaiian mountain they hold sacred are decrying the destruction of a stone altar they built near the construction site....
docs.lead_paragraph: People protesting the construction of a giant telescope on a Hawaiian mountain they hold sacred are decrying the destruction of a stone altar they built near the construction site.

headline.main: Things to Know About Automatic License Plate Readers
headline.print_headline: Things to Know About Automatic License Plate Readers

docs.snippet: Authorities chasing the suspect in a fatal shooting at Delta State University in Mississippi used an automatic license plate reader to track the man as he traveled across state lines. The technology was also used in Virginia weeks ago when a disgr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities chasing the suspect in a fatal shooting at Delta State University in Mississippi used an automatic license plate reader to track the man as he traveled across state lines. The technology was also used in Virginia weeks ago when a disgruntled former television reporter fatally shot two former colleagues during a live interview.

headline.main: Republicans Oppose New Safety Rules on Offshore Drilling
headline.print_headline: Republicans Oppose New Safety Rules on Offshore Drilling

docs.snippet: Republican lawmakers on Tuesday criticized an Obama administration move to toughen standards for offshore drilling, saying the new rules would be costly for drillers and threaten to shut down oil and gas exploration off the nation's coasts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican lawmakers on Tuesday criticized an Obama administration move to toughen standards for offshore drilling, saying the new rules would be costly for drillers and threaten to shut down oil and gas exploration off the nation's coasts.

headline.main: Murder Charge Filed in Shooting Outside Boys and Girls Club
headline.print_headline: Murder Charge Filed in Shooting Outside Boys and Girls Club

docs.snippet: A 21-year-old gang member has been charged with killing three people and wounding four others by shooting a stolen assault rifle into a crowd outside the Rochester Boys and Girls Club last month, authorities said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 21-year-old gang member has been charged with killing three people and wounding four others by shooting a stolen assault rifle into a crowd outside the Rochester Boys and Girls Club last month, authorities said Tuesday.

headline.main: Judge: Arrest for Cursing on Ticket Is a Rights Violation
headline.print_headline: Judge: Arrest for Cursing on Ticket Is a Rights Violation

docs.snippet: A village named Liberty must stand trial for arresting a man who wrote curse words on a speeding ticket and a prosecutor is liable for violating his First Amendment rights, a judge has decided....
docs.lead_paragraph: A village named Liberty must stand trial for arresting a man who wrote curse words on a speeding ticket and a prosecutor is liable for violating his First Amendment rights, a judge has decided.

headline.main: Near-Death Experience Gives South African Burger Perspective
headline.print_headline: Near-Death Experience Gives South African Burger Perspective

docs.snippet: Rugby World Cup fever might be all-pervading on the eve of the tournament but a brush with death has given South Africa's Schalk Burger a more measured outlook, he said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rugby World Cup fever might be all-pervading on the eve of the tournament but a brush with death has given South Africa's Schalk Burger a more measured outlook, he said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Notre Dame Defense Needs to Rebound After Poor Performance
headline.print_headline: Notre Dame Defense Needs to Rebound After Poor Performance
